mapper.select: select name, case sex when 1 then '男' else '女' end as sex, age, phone, email, wx, gold from t_wx_user where id = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.goldNum, case t1.goldType when 1 then '消费增加' else '兑换减少' end as goldType, date_format(t1.confirmTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as confirmTime from t_gold_detail t1, t_wx_user t2 where t1.wxId = t2.id and t1.flag = 1 and t2.id = #{id} order by t1.confirmTime desc

select t1.id, t1.consumeMoney, case t1.flag when 1 then '已确认' else '未确认' end as flag, date_format(t1.consumeTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as consumeTime, t3.tenantName from t_gold_detail t1, t_wx_user t2, t_user t3 where t1.wxId = t2.id and t1.userId = t3.id and t1.goldType = 1 and t2.id = #{id} order by t1.consumeTime desc

select t1.id, t1.goldNum, case t1.flag when 1 then '已确认' else '未确认' end as flag, date_format(t1.consumeTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as consumeTime, t3.name from t_gold_detail t1, t_wx_user t2, t_goods t3 where t1.wxId = t2.id and t1.goodsId = t3.id and t1.goldType = 0 and t2.id = #{id} order by t1.consumeTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_gold_detail(wxId, userId, consumeMoney, goldType, flag, consumeTime) values(#{id}, #{shopId}, #{consumeMoney}, '1', '0', now());
INSERT INTO t_user ( userName, password, credentialsSalt, useFlag, createTime, updateTime ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{password}, #{credentialsSalt}, '1', NOW(), NOW() );

INSERT INTO t_wx_user ( id, useFlag, name, sex, age, phone, email, wx, gold, remark, createTime, updateTime ) VALUES ( #{id}, '1', #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{wx}, 0, #{remark}, NOW(), NOW() );
mapper.update: update t_wx_user set name = #{name}, age = #{age}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, wx = #{wx}, remark = #{remark}, updateTime = NOW() where id = #{id}
